original_text: The Horims also dwelt in Seir beforetime; but the children of Esau succeeded them, when they had destroyed them from before them, and dwelt in their stead; as Israel did unto the land of his possession, which the Lord gave unto them.
korean_text: 호리 사람도 세일에 거주하였는데 에서의 자손이 그들을 멸하고 그 땅에 거주하였으니 이스라엘이 여호와께서 주신 기업의 땅에서 행한 것과 같았느니라)

sentences.original_text: The Horims also dwelt in Seir beforetime
but the children of Esau succeeded them
when they had destroyed them from before them
as Israel did unto the land of his possession
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘이 그 소유의 땅에 행한 것과 같음이라

sentences.original_text: which the Lord gave unto them
